sentences.sContent: Let us restate the assertions above as a theorem .
sentences.sContent_eng: Let us restate the assertions above as a theorem .
sentences.sCn: 我们把上述的断言重新表述为一个定理。

sentences.sContent: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.sCn: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

trans.tranOther: a statement, especially in mathematics, that you can prove by showing that it has been correctly developed from facts
